name: XCTAttachment
desc: Data from a test method’s execution, such as a file, image, screenshot, data blob, or ZIP file.

items.name: init(data: Data)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing the provided data payload.

items.name: init(data: Data, uniformTypeIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing the provided data payload, with a custom UTI.

items.name: init(uniformTypeIdentifier: String?, name: String?, payload: Data?, userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing the provided data payload, optionally with a custom UTI, name, and user-provided metadata dictionary.

items.name: init(contentsOfFile: URL)
items.desc: Creates an attachment from the contents of an existing file on disk.

items.name: init(contentsOfFile: URL, uniformTypeIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates an attachment from the contents of an existing file on disk, with a custom UTI.

items.name: init(compressedContentsOfDirectory: URL)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing a zipped archive of an existing directory on disk.

items.name: init(image: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing a PNG representation of the provided image.

items.name: init(image: UIImage, quality: XCTAttachment.ImageQuality)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing a representation of the provided image at the requested image quality.

items.name: init(screenshot: XCUIScreenshot)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing a PNG representation of the provided screenshot.

items.name: init(screenshot: XCUIScreenshot, quality: XCTAttachment.ImageQuality)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing a representation of the provided screenshot at the requested image quality.

items.name: class XCUIScreenshot
items.desc: A captured image of a screen, app, or UI element state.

items.name: enum XCTAttachment.ImageQuality
items.desc: Compression quality options for image-based attachments.

items.name: init(plistObject: Any)
items.desc: Creates an attachment from an object that can be represented in an XML property list.

items.name: init(archivableObject: NSSecureCoding)
items.desc: Creates an attachment from an object that conforms to NSSecureCoding.

items.name: init(archivableObject: NSSecureCoding, uniformTypeIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates an attachment from an object that conforms to NSSecureCoding, with a custom UTI.

items.name: init(string: String)
items.desc: Creates an attachment containing the provided string.

items.name: var lifetime: XCTAttachment.Lifetime
items.desc: Indicates whether the attachment is kept or discarded when its associated test passes.

items.name: enum XCTAttachment.Lifetime
items.desc: The possible lifetime values for a test attachment.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The attachment’s name, or nil if the attachment is unnamed.

items.name: var uniformTypeIdentifier: String
items.desc: The Uniform Type Identifier (UTI) of the data represented by the attachment.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: User-provided metadata associated with the attachment.
